plot: This picture takes you back to your boyhood days when you laid around the corner for some old fellow who could not run after you, and when opportunity offered pelted him with snowballs. We've all been there, many a time. The picture is full of motion; so are the snowballs.   Written by  Lubin Catalog
title: Bataille de neige
